website_summaries.verdict: You get two cameras in one with the DUO model. Packed with features, it's almost like a grown-up camera.
pros: Front and rear-facing cameras making it easy to take all sorts of pictures
Auto shut-off, automatic flash, and a Photo Optimization feature that snaps several photos and saves the best
Built-in games will keep kids entertained but parental controls can limit use or turn them off completely
cons: Younger children may be overwhelmed by the amount of features

customer_reviews.title: So a very important piece that isnt mentioned is that ...
customer_reviews.text: So a very important piece that isnt mentioned is that you cannot charge the camera. Rather, you have to buy new batteries. After one week of use, the batteries are dead.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Starter Camera but Do you need it?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera for my three year old. I will split up Pros and Cons than writing a review, since ultimately that would be more you are looking for Pros: 1) Sturdy Product 2) Easy Menu's especially for Kids 3) Intuitive sound for keeping kids engaged Cons: 1) Below Standard Images 2) Kids tend to move the camera while taking pics. This is not handled. 3) Though Sturdy, we lost one grip once my three year old dropped it down 4) Preview LCD has little protection. Verdict: If you need to wait, I will recommend that to get a Shock Proof and Waterproof camera.
customer_reviews.author: Udayam

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I think it's perfect. I am a photographer and I got this for my 3 year old boy. He handles it very well. He takes it every time we go out. It allows us to have a hobby together. The only down side is the wrist band to carry it while not using it. A shoulder strap or belt type strap would be way more logical for a child. Otherwise its awesome. Also love the fact that you can disable the games. Games on a camera doesnt even make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Blair

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Based on previous reviews, I was skeptical about the software but decided to give it a try anyway. Knowing it was a kids camera, the quality of pictures wasn't important. I just wanted a camera she could play with and have fun. Day 1, opened it up and immediately put in brand new batteries. Within 20 minutes the screen froze and the buttons wouldn't allow us to move around under the menu. Followed the troubleshooting directions to remove the batteriesand wait. Was able to reset it. It continued to happen every time she played with it. After day 3, it wouldn't reset at all. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Broken used camera on Christmas! So Angry!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for our 6 yr old Daughter for Christmas. When she opened it we noticed it looked used (scratches). The batteries were already in the camera and they were dead. We put in new batteries and the screen was white and it didn’t work. I connected it to the computer and low and behold it was used. There were a bunch of pictures of a family opening their Christmas presents probably last year. You can imagine the disappointment from our Daughter. We were so angry.
customer_reviews.author: NeverAgain

customer_reviews.title: Really love it for a kids first camera
customer_reviews.text: Really love it for a kids first camera. You can go under parental controls and turn off the games which I think is great. I got it for a camera, not games :) Fits in your hands very nicely and feel strong. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: rachel dodd

customer_reviews.title: WAY Better than the previous model
customer_reviews.text: This is a million times better than the previous model. Fun little pictures games they can play on it too. It has an internal timer you can set that will limit the amount of time they can play those games. It can actually store a good amount of videos and pictures. The last model had I think 16 MB of internal memory. That's insanely small. They probably had to pay some company extra just to produce something to 2001 standards. This one has 256 MB which is still relatively small BUT you can pop a micro SD card in to go to 1 GB up to 32 GB.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: ) Its still a great camera and with the included games
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old grandson as a birthday present as he has always been interested in using my SLR camera. He loves this camera. The only downside is that the memory card that comes with it has a very very very tiny capacity. If I'd checked it out more thoroughly, I would have bought him another, larger memory card. (I was just going to give him one of my 32 GB memory cards, but the camera requires the new tiny memory cards.) Its still a great camera and with the included games, it's really fun!
customer_reviews.author: VaBeachMomma

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my 5 year old as a birthday gift and he LOVES it. It's so much fun. You can take "selfies" and it has fun stickers and filters (kind of similar to Snapchat.) It also had games on it so when he's not taking pictures he is still getting used to the buttons by playing the games. It really helps kids get familiar with cameras and exploring creativity. I would highly recommend this for any kid! I'm planning on purchasing more for my other kids.
customer_reviews.author: StoneySmurf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Initially this product was great. My son loved it, however, when the batteries died the first time, after replacing the batteries as instructed the product would turn on for a few seconds and then die again. This happened with at least 4 different pair of new batteries. After contacting Amazon and Vtech for support there was nothing they could do about it as it was 30 days after purchase. VERY DISAPPOINTED in the quality of this product, but more disappointed in the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters love this camera, however just as others stated..... it last about 90 days!!!!!!! Tooo expensive for little warranty especially when the product is MADE FOR CHILDREN!
customer_reviews.author: S. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was so in love! Worked great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so in love! Worked great. The battery died and we charged it like we were supposed to and since then it will only turn on for 5-10 minutes at a time. I've tried talking to the company with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Britney_c

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun -- wish I'd had one when I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a little complex for my preschooler to use, but he LOVES it and I think he will understand it better as time passes. In the meantime it is still a lot of fun (if not always being used in the prescribed fashion). It has a front cam, selfie cam, flash (which can be turned off), and lots of goofy "stamps" and stuff so you can take photos of your friends looking like they are in a shower of stars, wearing cakes on their heads, etc. It also has a voice recorder and a video camera, though I think you'd want a memory card if you were going to use those.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for disabled adults or adult confused with technology.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for me like last year I am 35 years old. I got it because I can't figure out electronic stuff. This is supper easy to use and I use it a LOT to take pics to post on facebook. Please consider this for young kids and disabled adults too. It is super hearty..I dropped it a few times and it's fine! and, the picture is OK it's not great a bit blury BUT, it takes less time to uplad pics cause they are not as high def. I think this product should be on every kid's wish list!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and the kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: We bought an earlier version of this camera in 2015. It worked great and the kids loved it. Recently purchased this version. After the charge ran out the first time, it was never able to recharge. Can't download photos, can't do anything with it. Disappointing especially since my daughter used her own allowance for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good starter camera. If you ask me, the numerous buttons and commands are a bit confusing but after a while with it the kids seem to catch on. If you're looking for quality photos or display this isn't it. But the kids don't care. I can quickly and easily download their 100 ridiculous photos of the ground to free up more room. It's been sat on, thrown around and who knows what else and is still working. Being an evil mom, I like the "disable games" feature - it's a camera, take photos. Also, discovering the volume option was a great moment. We probably shouldve read the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so I bought this camera for my nephews. They absolutely loved this. Pros: 1) big display which makes it easier to see image. 2) flash is a game changer for kids camera as most of them don't have it. It helps improving low light photography 3) games are decent and fun to play with motion sensor. Importantly you can disable them if you want to. 3) image quality is decent for what i would like to see in kids camera. 4) battery life indicator Cons: 1) battery life could be better
customer_reviews.author: Raj P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is made for kids. My little boy dropped it one time and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Raines

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get battery to recharge
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 cameras only 2-3 months ago and they already broke! Both cameras once ran out of battery will not recharge when I try to recharge them! The cameras were great and the kids loved them but not worth the price if only last a couple of months and will not recharge!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sloan

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old granddaughter said “say cheese”!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my granddaughter for her 3rd birthday. I was a little concerned that she was a little young for it, but it’s perfect. She absolutely loves it. She loves taking selfies and pictures of everything and everyone she sees. The games and other options are a little advanced for her, but she will grow into it with the help of her older sister. The camera is well made and perfect for her small hands. It would have been nice if it was chargeable rather than just battery operated. I also bought a camera case for her to keep her camera in. She is a proud little Photographer!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: perfect camera for kids. Built in flash, slot for mini micro card for additional memory (Must buy), camera strap... easy for kids to use. a few games are on there and there are special effects to wrap around the picture.... I would suggest buying any small camera bag (Amazon had many to choose from) that is padded.... cameras are not a toy to throw on the floor with other toys.... best to get a economical camera bag (small) to protect the camera and to keep it dust free. You will get longer life for it. Excellent to take on vacation and to keep your child busy for long car rides. enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Stonick

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea for little ones but ours wouldn’t hold charge!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 yr old for her birthday bc she loves making videos and taking pictures. It was a huge hit, except after a short lived few pictures, the battery died... no big deal, I thought, as it’s a USB charge... except this unit will NOT charge. A very disappointed little girl and an annoyed mama, as I had already thrown out all the packaging upon opening the gift and it’s not an inexpensive item! I’m hoping for a refunds since it’s obviously defective, but I will not be repurchasing regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Durable nostril photography
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves the camera, and despite being 2 and doing what a 2 year old does, it's still going strong. I love pictures of thumbs and nostrils! I have quite the collection now, and look forward to many more interesting subjects as tastes and hand-eye coordination evolve.
customer_reviews.author: JBlairNJ

customer_reviews.title: This is actually a decent camera, just wrapped up ...
customer_reviews.text: Update about 2 years later: My daughter has pretty much outgrown this and prefers stealing our cell phones, but this camera has taken a beating that only a kid can provide and it is still working well. This is actually a decent camera, just wrapped up in a child friendly case. It has a few games to play as well. This gave my daughter (and her friends) a camera to play with so they won't have to keep asking to play with our more expensive camera's. The only this missing is a bluetooth remote...now that I got a bluetooth remote for my camera on my phone, now my daughter wants to play with that instead of her VTech camera. :0)
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our six year old for Christmas. It goes everywhere with him! He doesn't spend a lot of time on electronics and was able to figure out all the features by himself over the course of a few days. I'd say that's a testiment to it's ease of use. The camera is durable and easy for him to handle. We have already uploaded a batch of his pictures into a Google photos album. It was very easy to plug in and transfer the photos then delete them off the camera to make room for more. The photos are decent enough quality - keep in mind this is a kid's camera, not the newest iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great kids camera.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Nephew for Christmas. And he loves it so much! It’s a great little camera. For what it is, the picture quality is pretty good. Think of a point and shoot from 5-10 years ago. But it’s a lot of fun for a kid. It has picture effects, games built in. And it has a reverse selfie camera which is awesome. It seems very durable. I did also buy him a 32g memory card so he could take as many pics as he wants, the included card is pretty small. One thing to note, it’s not rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb K.

customer_reviews.title: Not rechargeable, but otherwise great for young kids.
customer_reviews.text: You don't get the greatest picture quality. To be fair, it is a camera meant for children, so I wasn't expecting pristine images. Only major downside is that it is not rechargeable. (I decided to buy rechargeable batteries for it separately.) Purchased this to keep my child from playing with my cameras and it has worked. They love the games on it, the colors, the filters, and that it has a selfie lense/camera built it. It has survived several drops already.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: perfect camera for kids. Built in flash, slot for mini micro card for additional memory (Must buy), camera strap... easy for kids to use. a few games are on there and there are special effects to wrap around the picture.... I would suggest buying any small camera bag (Amazon had many to choose from) that is padded.... cameras are not a toy to throw on the floor with other toys.... best to get a economical camera bag (small) to protect the camera and to keep it dust free. You will get longer life for it. Excellent to take on vacation and to keep your child busy for long car rides. enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Stonick

customer_reviews.title: Great present for Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: I deliberated hard over whether to buy a "toy" camera or a cheap real (adult) camera for my precocious 5 year old grandchild. Given as a birthday gift, liked it immediately and started using it immediately. By the next day she was taking dozens of photos on her own at a local zoo. I bought an additional 16GB memory card which should be good for thousands of photos by my calculation. It looks tough enough to survive a drop (which can't be said of most of the cheap adult cameras). A good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond M Jr..

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this camera, I was worried she wasn't going to be able to function it because of all the buttons, but those worries were for not. She loves it, takes pictures and videos without a problem. She also really enjoys the vast array of filters built into the camera. The pictures are easy to go thru, and the auto shut off feature is a huge plus, because she never remembers to shut it off. The batteries seem to last a significant time based on the amount she uses it. This was one of two cameras that we had purchased for Christmas, and after exploring both, this is the one we chose.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Still a hit one year later
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her birthday last year and it has held up and held her interest (as well as her 3yr old brother's) amazingly well. They love all of the games and features and I love that I can set a daily time limit on the games. The internal memory fills up fast but they know how to delete pictures and video on their own now so it's not a big deal. The one negative is it is not chargeable and goes through a lot of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: The Kruze Krew

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera in March and it died in July. So less than 5 months. Ours will boot up but then gets very laggy, taking 30 seconds to recognize that any button was pushed, and usually just hangs on the “set date and time” screen. We tried resetting it and and left batteries out of it for a day. Same result. Very disappointing. My 5 year old son had pictures from Disney and a beach vacation on the camera. We treated the camera gently, mom and dad always had it when not in use. I guess next time I’ll just buy an adult camera for him.
customer_reviews.author: PinJim

customer_reviews.title: Cute starter camera for the lil ones!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my lil 2 year old niece & it turns out my 3 year old niece loved it even more!! Now I'm going to get her her very own! I like all the features on the camera, but in this day & age of technology, I do wish the mega pixels on this cam were higher than 2.0. I know, I know, it's a child's camera, but that shouldn't compromise photo quality :) Overall, we love this camera and decided to purchase this one after all of the reviews on several other kid cams. This one seems to be easy to use, easy to handle and no worries when dropped! Thanks Vtech!
customer_reviews.author: VCR

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! Can’t wait to show granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-old granddaughter likes to borrow my camera to take photographs so I decided to get her one of her own that was more childproof. I was pleasantly surprised buy this camera. Not only does it take great pictures but has a flash, Video recorder and a voice recorder. It also has built-in games but I don’t think she’ll ever have the time to play those because she’ll be having so much fun taking photographs. If you want to share your love of photography with a little one in your life I strongly recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hume

customer_reviews.title: A great camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old grandson loves this camera. Inside of an hour or so he had learned how to use all the creative functions and was taking great photos. The quality of the printed photos was surprisingly good. I strongly recommend buying the slightly more expensive model with a larger internal memory, like I did. A good decision because he would have filled up the smaller memory quickly. The fact that it has an optional SD card is great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Mila

customer_reviews.title: Great First Camera for a 4-year old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4-year old even after reading all the negative reviews. Am very happy so far and just trying now to find a way to keep it for me, not him. Am impressed how quickly he was exploring the various functions and explaining things to me even though he hasn't read the very good instruction manual that comes with the camera. He has even allowed his 2-year old brother to mess with it and record videos. He does things with the camera on his own and proudly shows his Mama and me what he's done. We are all really happy with this purchase!! He still wants to borrow our telephone cameras but much less these days.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it! Little hard to operate though
customer_reviews.text: Man! My daughter loved it! Whenever I take my camera, my daughter come near to me , have a great smile on her face and try to operate my DSLR!! My wife suggested we get a camera for her to explore, and she advised this brand since it has a selfie mode too. It looks great but I feel that the buttons are little hard to reach for the 2 year old toddler. I hope she can reach and operates it easily soon :-) I'll post some of the pics she took soon ...
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Amazonian!

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Great for 4yr old. Low quality pics
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Not a good camera but definitely durable which is what a pre-K kid needs. It has issues in low light and issues with movement. The one real negative is that it has so many filters and trick for the kids to play with, and even games (ugh). Kids like the filters but it takes away from what the cameras are meant for, taking pictures. You can disable the games but they are still there and I imagine one day the kids will figure out how get to the games but hopefully by then they will be ready for a real camera.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: We've had this a year now and it is amazing. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We've had this a year now and it is amazing. Sturdy, easy to use for a 3 year old (older kids would love it too), and full of options. My daughter loves the changing colors options that come by twisting the front wheel around the lens. The lens is set deep in the camera so it won't get smudged. They've really thought of everything. This has come with us to balloon launches, parades, to the beach. I will say that my daughter is careful with her things, so I'm not sure how it stands up with a more exuberant toddler, but it really shows no sign of wear at all and has been dropped and molested some.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Photographer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was always using my phone to take pictures so I thought this would be a great alternative. It did not disappoint! The camera is easy to use and kid friendly. My daughter is 4 and it didn’t take long for her to figure out the features. I love that you can disable the games, which to me seems pointless to have on a camera. The camera is durable but a case would certainly come in handy, I plan to order one soon. She’s really enjoying taking photos around the house and “staging” us for her shoots. I can’t wait until Spring when we can really explore photography outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Liked it at first, but...
customer_reviews.text: Broken with unresponsive buttons after only 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: ( but when i can get her to turn camera around proper she ends up taking some great pictures. it makes her proud of herself
customer_reviews.text: wow. get this for real. there is so much stuff for your kid to do. i read the pamphlet on how to use and really only got for a camera for my 5 year old. i was very impressed with all the other things that you can do. my daughter loves it. she loves to take pitctures and quickly found out how to take a selfie :( but when i can get her to turn camera around proper she ends up taking some great pictures. it makes her proud of herself. overall i would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I brought this camera for my then 3 year old son, as he loves taking pictures! I love everything about this camera, he hasn't even accessed the games already installed. There is a 2-3 lag from the time you hear the click to the time it takes the actual picture which sucks, because he's so fast he will move the camera, but I'm teaching him to wait a bit before moving and taking another picture.
customer_reviews.author: Lakia Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Great kids camera, fun noises and extras
customer_reviews.text: My boys have spazzed out using this camera. My five year old who isn't allowed to operate our electronics (phones and tablets) learned all the options and buttons in less than a day of fiddling. He figured out that taking photos at his height involve a lot of rear ends, which he finds funny. The camera has helped him understand how he should take pictures and how long he should be smiling when we ask him to take pictures now. We are very impressed by the camera's capabilities and I interactive noises. We would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: DIY Mom

customer_reviews.title: kid friendly interface and sturdy, hardware is excellent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, kid friendly interface and sturdy, hardware is excellent. It takes decent pictures, my only complaint is the rate at which it consumes batteries. It takes four AA batteries and they last about two weeks before I have to replace. I use rechargeable to save money, but even with duracells they don't last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: For the Price it's Ok
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that I feel the picture quality is poor. It has a great battery life and easy for my 3 & 5 year old to use. They love them. They've had them for six months and still play with them regularly. I could have done without the games they put on it, because I really just wanted them to have a camera, but it did keep them entertained on our family vacation where we road-tripped it in the car.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Great learning camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 3yr old daughter to learn how to take better pictures. I love the durability of it but the pictures are really low quality. Even on the best resolution and using additional storage they still come out grainy. We like the playful picture features but feel they should have spent more time on a better quality camera than putting racing, fish, etc games on it. I didn't want a gaming system/toy, I wanted a camera. Not to leave out, it is a battery drainer.
customer_reviews.author: Kuheler

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were looking forward to purchasing this for our son for Christmas. The first camera we ordered, the batteries were nearly dead and it wouldn't recognize or format the data card I purchased for it. I tested the card in our video camera and it worked fine. I returned the camera for a replacement. The replacement wouldn't even turn on, so I also returned that one for a refund this time.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: For younger children
customer_reviews.text: Although this is made for much younger children, it was hard for me to understand the directions. I would guess it is made for 4-5 year olds, but are they really going to take real pictures that they want to print out? I sent this back and ordered some that appeared to be for older children (6&8) but even at that, this are mostly toys, not for great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera for my 3.5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old always showed interest in taking pictures with my DSLR or phone. This is a great first camera! It does NOT break and has SO many great features. I honestly wish my camera had some of the fun picture taking effects this has. He picked up on almost all the features on his own. I didn't realize, my fault I assume, that it has "video" games. He doesn't have any digital games yet so now having a little trouble getting it away from him when he turns it to that setting. All in all great pictures and keeps him occupied doing something I consider creative.
customer_reviews.author: CatLover704

customer_reviews.title: VTech Kidizoom DUO Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very well made as usual with other VTech toys I have seen through the years. My granddaughter is just turning 3 and it is so amazing to see how well she can work electronic devices including this one. It has games and special features to keep their interest besides taking rather good pictures which can be transferred to a computer or other storage device. This particular one does cost a bit more than the next one down, but after reading many reviews about that one, including poor picture quality, this one is definitely worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this unless you want to spend $ on Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four-year-old nephew. The directions were not clear. But what really made me angry --and I guess it's my fault --is that it requires four double-A batteries. There's no reason why this shouldnt be rechargeable. We thought it was. With the batteries, it worked sometimes. Sometimes it didn't. it was weird. Returned it. Will look for a better version that is rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: alicia shepard

customer_reviews.title: I have had no problems with the second one and my girls love it. They take lots of pictures and videos ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls had this for a week and dropped it and the battery cover broke on one side. I had to return it and get a new one which of course was a hassle and they advertise a picture of being able to drop it. I have had no problems with the second one and my girls love it. They take lots of pictures and videos and love the games on it.
customer_reviews.author: BL1981

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson's 5th bday. He loves it. Learned lot of the photo,options quickly. Seems sturdy...fits his hands well. He had an insta print camera and took so many pix it was an expensive habit. Now he can take lots of pix, view on camera, print if he wants, and delete those he doesn't want to keep...bought X tended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Loves2Read

customer_reviews.title: Fine as a kids’ camera, but has lots of video games too
customer_reviews.text: This works fine as a kids’ camera and has some fun features, like different frames kids can use, zooming, etc. But my kid doesn’t ever want to use it as a camera. She found the video games in it and is always trying to use it To play them. Now these games are probably super lame for kids who get more screen time than my kid does, but it drives us crazy, as we have very limited screen time and no games. But, if that’s not a concern to you, then this camera is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: fullmonty

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but be carefull witth times.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible present for kids. But be carefull with times your child is using it. it can be like watching tv for a kid. My child can stay hours and hours playing with the games and taking photos or recording video and she gets really grumpy when it is time to turn off the camera. So I give the camera twice a week or when we go to a special place to take photos but not play with games. Just telling my experience. Dont take me wrong we love the camera its great!.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Nieto Duran

customer_reviews.title: Junk toy that takes pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a child's Christmas gift. This is a toy NOT a camera! I felt heartsick when it arrived & discovered it had games & play filters, etc on it! What a piece of junk! It's going back in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Windy Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised and recommended over other kid-cameras
customer_reviews.text: Camera works as described and promised. Don’t expect decent quality photos - but perfect for young kids. The only downside I noticed is my son is so used to touch-screen everything that all the nobs were more challenging for him to master. That’s not why I gave 4-stars. I gave 4-stars because it’s as promised but for some reason fell flat for us. That said, I research a ton of other cameras and this one reigns number one in my book for price and promise.
customer_reviews.author: SFBeav

customer_reviews.title: Really not a bad product and great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves it so that makes me happy. It's a good product and note to self, you need to change the batteries on both sides of the camera. I just wish the quality of the pictures were a little better. It does hold a lot of pictures and the battery life is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our grandson for Christmas. Daughter-in-law recommended this when I was looking for ideas for gift giving. She had already done the research on it. It arrived on time and was well packaged. I am sure he will enjoy this camera and he won’t borrow his mom’s phone to take pictures anymore. Would recommend seller and camera.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl brockett

customer_reviews.title: The kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Both of our kids got these for Christmas and LOVE it. They love the fun stickers on it and the games as well. They've been taking it on road trips and family trips and really doing a great job capturing their memories (from their point of view) Kids are 3 & 5 for reference
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Pak

customer_reviews.title: Great Gifts- 7 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Got the Camera Pix for a 4 year old and knew my 7 year old would not be so pleased so I wanted one with a few more features. I was concerned it would be to "kiddie" for her but she enjoys it. She takes it out every day. Her grandmother got her a tablet so i thought she'd ditch the camera in a heartbeat and I've seen her put her Kindle down for this camera! She's caught on to the features easily. I believe the ease of holding it is what makes it so attractive to her. I am a photographer so it's nice to see what great pictures she has taken thus far!
customer_reviews.author: SheBoughtThat

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old son and it is the best gift choice ever made. So many tools and games easy to use so I don’t have to help him a hundred times a day. It store probably a hundred pictures but for us he just takes pictures of his get or forehead selfies, so we opt to delete all start fresh. You can buy an SD card. Or if you want to keep some delete others you can always delete one by one. All in all my 3 kids all enjoy something from this product. Also is VERY durable, tried and tested multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my son. He absolutely love it and uses it all the time. The camera was designed with kids in mind. The body of the camera is rubber which makes it shock resistant if it falls. The picture quality isn't great but the kiddo doesn't mind that. The camera comes loaded with games and a program to make silly pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cangarita

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 5-year-old granddaughter and it has become the hit of the entire extended family! She brings it to all family gatherings and loves showing off the photos she takes. After two months it is still working and looking great, even after all the times her 2-year-old brother has used and abused it.
customer_reviews.author: Old McMalmberg

customer_reviews.title: Enchanting color and functionality
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my 2 1/2 year-old niece and she was enchanted with it. She had learned how to take photos on her parents' smart phone so the concept was not new to her. The parents/responsible adults have to read instructions and help, but since my niece was immediately drawn to the camera, learning all the features will be an ongoing project. Interestingly, my niece started playing around with the different buttons and found some of the features on her own. It was fun to watch her delight.
customer_reviews.author: Hopefully Helpful

customer_reviews.title: Tips when the camera does not turn on anymore
customer_reviews.text: The camera does not last long at all. Only used a couple times and no longer works. I have a very unhappy child that would love to use a camera... Update... My camera does work and we found the reset button to get it working again.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: I didn't really want to spend too much and get a digital camera he would easily break. This was perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He is always taking our phones to take pictures so we decided we wanted to get him his own camera. Since he's only 4, I didn't really want to spend too much and get a digital camera he would easily break. This was perfect. It was easy for him to learn all of the features, it's durable, and easy to hold. He doesn't play the games on it very much, but still nice that they're there anyway.
customer_reviews.author: hthornhill

customer_reviews.title: Will no charge (2nd camera with same problem again)
customer_reviews.text: I’m livid. I bought my twins (boy/girl) these for Christmas. My daughter go the pink one and it’s had no problems. The blue one for my son worked for a bit and then wouldn’t charge. Was able to return it in enough time for it to be replaced. Now the second blue one we have received is Not charging. Of course I can’t return it now. It’s fun telling my son his doesn’t work again meanwhile his sisters does. I give this zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great first camera for your littles! The durability is five star. Pic quality is decent. I love the option to add an SD Card. My little loves taking videos and the SD card allows that extra space without having to go back and delete everything once camera storage is full. Turn the lens dial and you can change the color of your photos. We invested in some strong batteries due to the amount Of use we get out of it. I appreciate how big the screen is, the rear facing camera makes for some fun photos, and I love that the camera includes a flash. Definitely recommend this camera for your little!
customer_reviews.author: Grady Loew

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for our 3 year old. Easy to hold. Complex to navigate around some of the things it can do though (edits, trash, games, taking video versus still). Was the biggest screen we could find on a toddler camera which is why we bought it. Our toddler still prefers using her older brother’s regular point and shoot though because the quality of the pictures and the screen are better on that than on this camera. Overall good but doing it again we should have just gotten our child a regular point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A great first camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been perfect for our 3-year old!! She loves taking pictures and the Kidizoom Duo makes it so easy for her. She can operate the filters, switch to selfie mode and, best of all, take all the pictures that she wants to- especially those up close shots of the rug she seems so fascinated by! It has taken a few drops fairly well and it's burst mode seems to grab the good pictures, while she is doing her best to wiggle them into a blur!
customer_reviews.author: avengerhed

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We bought my son the camera for a birthday. He was very liked. Apparently the camera fell out of his hand and the internal screen broke - you can't see the picture you took, it happened just after 3 months. The product is very expensive and makes no sense that a camera breaks down so quickly Still, it's a camera designed for kids. I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: kristina gelzin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God this was a winner all the way around absolutely love this product we'll be buying another one for one other grandchild that thought that was for her when she seen it she grabbed it up and said mine mine mine mine I was almost scared to tell her no it was for one of the other grandchildren but when I did she was okay with it she just wants one she's only two
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Josey

customer_reviews.title: Toddler friendly.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. My son was really rough on them but he likes it a lot so do i. I have my own photographer at home can't complain he mostly take pictures of me. Pictures are not great but who cares it's for kids not for social media.
customer_reviews.author: preta

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly speaking my 5 yr. daughter loves it. I bought a camera strap and attached it to the camera and she walks around with it and takes pictures "just like her mommy"! I also got her a camera case from Best Buy where she stores it. I personally find the quality of the pictures not up to my standard. It takes better pictures in natural light than with flash. That being said I personally own a Pentax SLR camera and so my standard is pretty high. But, it's my daughter's camera and she sure has fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: PRAKRITI BASAK

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a child
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves this. He doesn't use half the features on it, but it's a really simple to understand camera. He is obsessed with it and brings it everywhere he goes. My only complaint is that when he presses the button to take a picture, it takes several seconds to actually snap the shot. My son is not patient enough for this so most of the time he accidentally gets shots of the ground. He doesn't really care though. The batteries also last a surprising amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product You get what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing camera for children! My toddler has dropped it many times and it actually takes very good pictures with a variety of picture modes. It is easy to figure out and it is amazing for a toddler. You can even add memory which is awesome. The SD card held about 600 pictures before it filled up. The games were user friendly and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: 5 Year Old Daughter LOVES this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 5th Birthday and she absolutely LOVES it!! She literally plays with it everyday and insists on toting it everywhere we go. The picture quality isn't the greatest but for a Kid's camera, I suppose that's to be expected. We ordered an SD card to go with it but so far l, we have yet to have to use ut. All in all, it is an excellent 1st camera for little ones. Item came just as described and in perfect working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie B.

customer_reviews.title: An intuitive camera for children
customer_reviews.text: My daughter takes it everywhere. It has a function where you can edit your pictures with graphics, she gets very creative around it. Also, it has games. The reason of 4 out of 5 stars is because it tends to eats up batteries rather quick. If I can make a suggestion then it would be to have a rechargeable battery option. If it’s available, then it’ll be a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Nambar

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Looked very nice, my 4 year old granddaughter loved it. 2 weeks in, it started acting like it was losing power. New batteries didn't help. Then within 2 more days, the screen went black and cannot take pictures. Apparently I purchased it too soon before her birthday because when it broke, the 30 day return was past. Sure wish it was good quality, she loves taking photos.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun to play with even as an adult! My daughter loves to take pictures of everything including herself! It's great to have the selfie mode! Has games to play tons of filters, worth the money! We even bought the case for it! She feels like a little pro!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kleinsmith

customer_reviews.title: VTECH kids duo camera and video recorder
customer_reviews.text: Great Little camera for young children. My granddaughters are five. This camera/video has a lot of options to keep them occupied. I recommend getting a SD card to save pictures and videos because the camera does not have a lot of memory. It actually takes real pictures and videos. It’s also easy for them to handle, and durable if they drop it
customer_reviews.author: Kay G

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: An absolute hit with my 5.5 yr old niece. Being able to turn off the games was a must because she of course discovered them immediately. The selfie mode was very popular and all the different filters made her feel like a big girl. I think she snapped 50 photos all within Christmas morning so the additional memory card that I purchased was a must. Only negative is the batteries it will blow through.
customer_reviews.author: nicole m seaman

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Quality of image is what you expect from a kids camera but the selfie option is really neat. There are fun games on it that are old school quality but fun. I bought this for my 5 year old daughter and i think its a great age for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great kids camera - on flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera so much and my daughter takes it everywhere with her - she loves taking pictures and playing games. The only flaw is that it's not rechargeable. So annoying since it has cord - but it runs through batteries quick and takes (4) AA so we are having to change-out a lot of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect gift for a 5 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this camera. It has pretty decent resolution for a kids camera, and also has fun bonuses like stickers, video, voice manipulation (robot etc), and simple age-appropriate games. She is able to manipulate the camera herself once she was showed how it operates. Absolutely great find, very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: socalgary

customer_reviews.title: A kid favorite at our house!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this camera. Bought it when my son turned three. Every kid who comes over gravitates to it. I bought it for my nephew who lived it at our house and he was super stoked to get it as a gift. The games are great and we love all the “filters”.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N.

customer_reviews.title: Say cheese
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old granddaughter. She loved it. Just the right size for her to hold it and snap a pictue. Not sure about the battery life I know.she used it all the time for a week and then the batteries died. Hopefully this will not be an on going thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old son for Christmas. He loves it and plays with it constantly. The reason for the four star review is that without a micro SD card it only holds a few photos. Also the batteries died right away. It doesn't have a rechargeable battery so that was a little frustrating but I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Russo

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my son and he loves it. Takes amazing picture quality and I like how you can use an sd card for extra memory. My son has dropped it and threw it and it's still in great condition. Also the games are pretty fun. Works on 4 AA batteries, if used frequently the batteries get drained pretty fast but over all it's a great camera for kids
customer_reviews.author: usmc85

customer_reviews.title: Nice Vtech Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this as a gift to my four year old grandson. I am sure he is going to love it! The packaging on this is quite nice, it does come in the vtech presenting package so would make a nice present under the tree once opened. I would read elsewhere on here for the use as it is a gift but I have never had an instance that vtech did not score on the does what it was intended to scale.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old. She was really excited to use this but after 3 weeks, it stopped working. Even after putting in new batteries, the camera reads that it needs batteries. Frustrating. I threw away the box or I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Fun until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and lots of fun until one month after the warranty expired, when the microphone stopped working. VTech customer support basically said too bad, try changing the batteries. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery goes dead in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loved the camera, however the cameras interface seems a little advanced for any child below 8 - 9 yrs old. It seems like a sturdy camera, however the battery seems to not we working after a couple weeks of use. I've put it new double A batteries and even attempted to charge via the USB cord... But no dice.
customer_reviews.author: VA to UT

customer_reviews.title: Great child's camera
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter (4 years old) absolutely loves this camera! It is quite large so I was afraid it would be too cumbersome, but she pulls it out constantly taking pictures of everyday things as her life goes by. It will be a treasure as she grows older to see the world through her younger eyes! The features are all great. She is easily able to work her way through the buttons to find just the one she needs for the photo project she has in mind.
customer_reviews.author: SEDB

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera provided your kids aren't spoiled.
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids ages 4-8, provided they aren't already spoiled and using your Iphone and Galaxy. This camera has a lot of really cool features. This will give them hours of fun. Has some simple games, lots of filters and fun apps for the camera. The photos are really grainy and low quality, but the case is tough and well made. Both my daughters have played with it and dropped it. It's still kicking after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Resistant, and very fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing!! She wouldn't put it down for the first two months after we got it... and today she still uses it and has lots of fun! Even I have fun playing with this thing! Is very resistant too... my husband forgot it on top of the car and drove away... the thing rolled on concrete, the batteries fell out and it got one scratch! That's all!! Would totally buy again... great investment for hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kids camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing! My 4 year old absolutely loves it! And the selfie feature is her favorite thing about it haha. I was pretty impressed when I saw some of the photos she took with it. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Alishia

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect hands are able to grip. Screen is big to see. Games are great not sure about picture development haven't done that yet but looks like it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: railroad blonde

product_meta.title: VTech Kidizoom Duo Selfie Camera, Amazon Exclusive, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueYour child can discover their creativity with the Kidizoom duo by VTech. This real digital camera is great for kids and is durable enough to handle drops and tumbles. The Kidizoom duo features a 2. 4" color LCD screen and can take photos and videos in addition to a rear-facing camera that’s perfect for taking selfies. Your child can also get creative using laugh-out-loud photo effects in addition to cartoon and collage effects. They can download their photos and videos to a computer using the included micro USB cable (for file transferring and not for charging) and share them with family and friends. For even more fun, they can also play five included games, including three that are Motion-controlled. Camera is not rechargeable; it operates with 4 AA batteries included for demo purposes, use new batteries for regular use.
feature_bullets: The Kidizoom Duo is a real digital camera that’s great for kids and durable enough to handle drops and tumbles
Features a 2. 4" color LCD screen and can take photos and videos in addition to a rear-facing camera that’s perfect for taking selfies
Get creative using laugh-out-loud photo effects in addition to cartoon and collage effects

Comes with five games, including three that are motion-controlled, for even more fun. Download photos and videos to a computer using the included micro USB cable and share them with family and friends. Includes also 1 wrist strap
Camera is not rechargeable, it operates with 4 AA batteries included for demo purposes, use new batteries for regular use. Intended for ages 3 to 9 years. Product dimensions 6. 4" x 3. 6" x 2. 3"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,556 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
